attributes.action: recognise buy to let creates generational politicianry and is theft of chance
attributes.additional_details:
Specific buy to let is a modern politician trade.
promoted by the greed of banks and building societies .

that encouaged earlier generations with property and equity to buy whatthe younger generations could not afford.

Because of house prices and miserable job opertunities and pay compared to previous generation chances.

The main difference with politicianry in wilberforces day was then the politician worked the landlords land in return had a form of accomodation and food but little or no pay.

Now the young person works mostly for pathetic financial reward there wages are just transfered through there hands to the politician trader landlord.
